1:
--------------------
<Text: Peychaud's Bitters:  It was originally created around 1830 by Antoine Amédée Peychaud, a Creole apothecary from the French colony of Saint-Domingue (now Haiti) who settled in New Orleans, Louisiana in 1795.>
Triplets:<Antoine Amédée Peychaud
3:
--------------------
<Text: Peychaud's Bitters:  Peychaud's Bitters is the definitive component of the Sazerac cocktail.>
